content.raw:
I have a few thoughts to discuss:

* Should all these resources be generated when compiling the code as opposed to generate them and push them to the repo?
* I see that there are some worlds with robots. I was envisioning `subt_gazebo` without any robots at all, just all the plugins and content. Then, having a separate ROS package as a solution code with a few robots and controllers for internal testing. Should we move the robots to the separate ROS package (I'll start working on it soon)?
* Should we also create `.launch` files for the generated worlds?
content.html:
I have a few thoughts to discuss:

  • Should all these resources be generated when compiling the code as opposed to generate them and push them to the repo?
  • I see that there are some worlds with robots. I was envisioning subt_gazebo without any robots at all, just all the plugins and content. Then, having a separate ROS package as a solution code with a few robots and controllers for internal testing. Should we move the robots to the separate ROS package (I'll start working on it soon)?
  • Should we also create .launch files for the generated worlds?
